ValueSet-IMMZD2DTTyphoidTCVVS.description: JSON Schema for IMMZD2DTTyphoidTCV ValueSet for Decision Table ValueSet codes. Generated from FHIR expansions using IRI format.
enum: http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZDAK#Client is not due for Typhoid vaccination-48
http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZDAK#No typhoid primary series doses were administered-116
http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZDAK#Client's age is between 6 months and 45 years-52
http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZDAK#Client's age is more than or equal to 45 years-41
http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZDAK#Clinical judgement is required. Create a clinical note-66
http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZDAK#One typhoid primary series dose was administered-116
ValueSet-IMMZD2DTTyphoidTCVVS.narrative: This schema validates IRI-formatted codes for the IMMZD2DTTyphoidTCV ValueSet for Decision Table ValueSet. Each enum value includes the system URI in the format {systemuri}#{code} to match JSON-LD enumeration IRIs. Display values are available at http://smart.who.int/immunizations/ValueSet-IMMZD2DTTyphoidTCVVS.displays.json. For a complete listing of all ValueSets, see artifacts.html#terminology-value-sets.
